traits.name: Incite Rage
traits.detail: Allies within 10ft of you have advantage on melee attacks, and are immune to being charmed or frightened.

traits.name: (Supporter) Rallying Cry
traits.detail: Halve your attack damage to remove a condition from an ally.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: The gigantes makes two spear attacks. In place of a spear attack, the witch can remove an ongoing condition from one ally that can hear it.

actions.name: Spear
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 14 (2d8+5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spit Poison
actions.detail: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ [28, d6] poison damage, and the target must make a [dc-secondary] CON save or be poisoned (save ends).

actions.name: Destructive Wave (1/day)
actions.detail: Each creature of your choice within 30' of you must make a [dc-primary] CON save or take 17 (5d6) thunder damage and 17 (5d6) necrotic damage, and be knocked prone (half damage on save).
